text: Armed with spears and bows, dozens of indigenous protesters in Brazil vowed to maintain a roadblock on a key highway through the Amazon until the authorities help them fight against COVID-19 and deforestation. Members of the Kayapo Mekranoti ethnic group have been blocking the road
